HOME.Informacion: Design your assignments and training sessions with us

TUTORIALES.InformacionTutorial: Explanatory videos to learn how to get started with the tool
TUTORIALES.CrearMaterialDescripcion: Click on the material that we want to place in the field, it will appear in the Materials section and you can drag and drop it to the field
TUTORIALES.CrearJugadoresDescripcion: Click on the player you want to place, in this case, local or visitor, it will appear in its section at the top and you can drag and drop it on the field
TUTORIALES.CrearTrazoDescripcion: Click anywhere on the playing field and then move the mouse in any direction forming the line you want. To stop drawing, click on the end of the path
TUTORIALES.BorrarDescripcion: There are two ways to erase, only the strokes or all (strokes and elements), you just have to press the corresponding red button
TUTORIALES.DescargarActualizarImagenDescripcion: When I generate the image by clicking on Preview, we will have the possibility to update the image through a button, in case you want to make any last minute changes or to download it, to save it on your computer
TUTORIALES.GenerarPDFDescripcion: We open the preview of the image and we will have a red Generate PDF button, which will generate it including the data entered in the form

CONTACTO.LabelContacto: Follow us on our social media and contact us for any questions or suggestions

ACERCADE.InformacionPersonal: Antonio José Mata Periáñez, born in August 11 in 1995 and UnderdogToWin developer.
ACERCADE.InformacionAcademica: Website developer, Soccer Coach (UEFA A) and player as a hobbie
ACERCADE.InformacionEntrenador: Now in Club Atlético de Madrid as a coach.
ACERCADE.InformacionApp: The app UnderDogToWin is born to improve soccer technology. You can download the full assignment with its image, explanations and the duration, as well as only the image, so that it can be used in the future for next sessions or to be shared with your colleagues.
ACERCADE.Objetivo1: To facilitate the realization of training sessions for soccer lovers.
ACERCADE.Objetivo2: To study rival teams performance with the whiteboard.
ACERCADE.InformacionMision: To bring a technological tool to managers and soccer clubs so that they can show off their talent on this sport.

FOOTER.Informacion: Visit our social media and keep updated with our app

ERROR.Mensaje: The website doesn't exist or keep in progress
